column4: I need help. My computer can't handle ubuntu 9.04 and I want to switch to xubuntu 9.04. will that speed up my computer at all? and how do I do it? I have an intel pentium III processor that runs at 737Mhz and 256Mb of ddr1 RAM
Xubuntu should work well on your machine.
i'd recommend installing the package xubuntu-desktop. It will take care of everything.
